name: Hypno Meduso
description:
Hypnotise the animals with your powerful stare, but avoid Medusa's gaze.

Uses face detection to control the hypnosis - just stare at the screen.

Tap to start.

Created for #altctrlgamejam

Created using Pocket Code for Android.

Available as a standalone Android apk or original Pocket Code version.

To run the Pocket code version:

Download & install Pocket Code app.

Then either:

1. Download the zip file, uncompress and install it in the Pocket Code directory on device.

or

2. Via the PocketCode app Explore button find and download the Hypno Meduso game from the Pocketcode.org site.
